TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit ProxyGenerator extends System.Object
public ref class ProxyGenerator abstract sealed

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法来检索用于生成代理类的 Web 服务、 Windows Communication Foundation 服务，或具有的静态页方法的 ECMAScript (JavaScript) 代码应用的属性。Use the method to retrieve the ECMAScript (JavaScript) code that is used to generate the proxy class for a Web service, for a Windows Communication Foundation service, or for static page methods that have the attribute applied.

summary.span: 检索指定类型的代理生成代码。

span.span: Retrieves the proxy generation code for the specified type.

MemberSignature.Value: public static string GetClientProxyScript (Type type, string path, bool debug);
.method public static hidebysig string GetClientProxyScript(class System.Type type, string path, bool debug) cil managed
public: static System::String ^ GetClientProxyScript(Type ^ type, System::String ^ path, bool debug);
static member GetClientProxyScript : Type * string * bool -> string

param.name: type
param.span: 要获取其脚本的对象的类型。

span.span: The type of the object to obtain the script for.

param.name: debug
param.span: 表示包含 XML 代码注释；否则为 。

span.span: to include XML code comments; otherwise, .

summary.span: 检索指定类型的代理生成代码。

span.span: Retrieves the proxy generation code for the specified type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回代理生成 ECMAScript (JavaScript) 的 Web 服务、 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 服务，或具有的静态页方法的应用的属性。The method returns the proxy-generation ECMAScript (JavaScript) for a Web service, for a Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) service, or for static page methods that have the attribute applied. `type`参数包含的类型的 Web 服务类、 WCF 服务类或 ASP.NET 页类。The `type` parameter contains the type of the Web service class, WCF service class, or ASP.NET page class. 当该类型为 WCF 服务类或接口、 类或接口必须具有应用的属性。When the type is a WCF service class or interface, the class or interface must have the attribute applied. 如果`debug`参数是`true`，生成的代码包含可以用于在 Visual Studio 中的 IntelliSense 支持或其他开发环境的 XML 代码注释。If the `debug` parameter is `true`, the resulting code contains XML code comments that can be used for IntelliSense support in Visual Studio or other development environments. 因此，生成的大小是脚本的更大。As a result, the size of the generated script is larger.

exception.span: 代理生成不支持该指定类型。

span.span: The specified type is not supported for proxy generation.

MemberSignature.Value: public static string GetClientProxyScript (Type type, string path, bool debug, System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint serviceEndpoint);

public: static System::String ^ GetClientProxyScript(Type ^ type, System::String ^ path, bool debug, System::ServiceModel::Description::ServiceEndpoint ^ serviceEndpoint);

param.span: 要获取其脚本的对象的类型。

span.span: The type of the object to obtain the script for.

param.name: debug
param.span: 表示包含 XML 代码注释；否则为 。

span.span: to include XML code comments; otherwise, .

summary.span: 使用路径和服务终结点检索指定类型的代理生成代码。

span.span: Retrieves the proxy generation code for the specified type using the path and service end point.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回代理生成 ECMAScript (JavaScript) 的 Web 服务、 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 服务，或具有的静态页方法的应用的属性。The method returns the proxy-generation ECMAScript (JavaScript) for a Web service, for a Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) service, or for static page methods that have the attribute applied. `type`参数包含的类型的 Web 服务类、 WCF 服务类或 ASP.NET 页类。The `type` parameter contains the type of the Web service class, WCF service class, or ASP.NET page class. 当该类型为 WCF 服务类或接口、 类或接口必须具有应用的属性。When the type is a WCF service class or interface, the class or interface must have the attribute applied. 如果`debug`参数是`true`，生成的代码包含可以用于在 Visual Studio 中的 IntelliSense 支持或其他开发环境的 XML 代码注释。If the `debug` parameter is `true`, the resulting code contains XML code comments that can be used for IntelliSense support in Visual Studio or other development environments. 因此，生成的大小是脚本的更大。As a result, the size of the generated script is larger.

exception.span: 代理生成不支持该指定类型。

span.span: The specified type is not supported for proxy generation.
